item.title: CVE-2024-20090|2024-10-07T14:05:24.427Z -- mediatek%2C%20inc. -- mt6761%2C%20mt6765%2C%20mt6768%2C%20mt6779%2C%20mt6785%2C%20mt6853%2C%20mt6873%2C%20mt6885%2C%20mt8385%2C%20mt8666%2C%20mt8667%2C%20mt8766%2C%20mt8768%2C%20mt8781%2C%20mt8788%2C%20mt8789
item.description: In vdec, there is a possible out of bounds write due to a missing bounds check. This could lead to local escalation of privilege with System execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed for exploitation. Patch ID: ALPS09028313; Issue ID: MSV-1703.
